name: Lightsaber Proficiency
Lore: 'A Jedi learns not only to wield a lightsaber, but how to channel the Force to increase skill and control the lightsaber''s damage.',
Text: 'Deploy on any character with ability > 2 and a lightsaber. That character is power +3 in battles or may add 1 to Force drain where present. Effect is lost if character loses lightsaber.',
